backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the ICP backend implementing user profiles, candidate admissions, gallery, news, and admin/super-admin management with role-based access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming the replacement of the home page hero logo with the circular करणी सेना युवा शक्ति emblem image saved as a static asset and rendered in HomePage.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key details of each component, page, hook, and configuration file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Root CSS file importing Tailwind directives and defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including sidebar, chart, and destructive variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'करणी सेना युवा शक्ति' in Devanagari script and mounting the app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for home, admission, and protected admin pages, wrapping the app in ThemeProvider and rendering a global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied UI component displaying a shield alert icon, explanatory message, and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/AdminCandidatesL: Admin component that fetches and displays all admission candidates in an accordion list with photo, admission ID badge, and detailed fields including father's name and qualification.
frontend/src/components/AdminGalleryMana: Admin gallery management component that handles adding and deleting gallery photos with admin authorization checks, loading states, and descriptive error toasts for unauthorized actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminManagementS: React component for managing admins, allowing authenticated users to add/remove admins and reset the admin system via form inputs and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminNewsManager: React component for admins to create, edit, and delete news posts, with a form toggled by state and a sorted list of existing news items.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionCard.ts: Displays a printable admission card with applicant details (name, DOB, photo, etc.) and a print button, styled for both screen and print media.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a photo gallery section by fetching gallery items from a hook, showing skeletons while loading and an empty state if no images exist.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploadField: A reusable image upload field supporting drag-and-drop and file selection, with preview, upload progress, and removal functionality using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell layout component with a sticky header, responsive navigation links, and Internet Identity login/logout handling for both desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/NewsSection.tsx: Displays a grid of news items fetched via `useGetAllNewsItems`, sorted by date descending, with loading skeletons and an empty state fallback.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter their name, then saves it via `useSaveCallerUserProfile`.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards admin routes by checking authentication and admin status, attempting super-admin initialization if needed, and rendering `AccessDeniedScreen` when access is not granted.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddAdmin.ts: Mutation hook that calls `actor.addAdmin` with a principal string and invalidates the `admins` query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddGalleryItem.ts: Mutation hook that uploads an image and description to the backend via `actor.addGalleryItem` and invalidates the `galleryItems` query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that creates a news item with title, content, and timestamp via `actor.createNewsItem`, invalidating `newsItems` on success.
Mutation hook that deletes a gallery item by description via `actor.deleteGalleryItem` and invalidates the `galleryItems` query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that deletes a news item by title via `actor.deleteNewsItem` and invalidates the `newsItems` query.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook that edits an existing news item's content and timestamp via `actor.editNewsItem`, invalidating `newsItems` on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAdmins.ts: Query hook that fetches the list of admins via `actor.getAdmins`, enabled only when the actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllCandidates.t: Query hook that fetches all candidates via `actor.getAllCandidates`, enabled only for authenticated users with a ready actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllNewsItems.ts: Query hook that fetches all news items via `actor.getAllNewsItems`, enabled when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current caller's user profile via `actor.getCallerUserProfile`, exposing combined loading and fetched states.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetGalleryItems.ts: Query hook that fetches all gallery items via `actor.getGalleryItems`, enabled when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSuperAdm: Mutation hook that calls `actor.initializeSuperAdmin` and invalidates admin-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: Query hook that checks whether the current caller is an admin via `actor.isCallerAdmin`, enabled only for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveAdmin.ts: Mutation hook that removes an admin by principal string via `actor.removeAdmin` and invalidates the `admins` query.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetAdminSystem.t: Mutation hook that force-resets the admin system via `actor.resetAdminSystemForce` and invalidates admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Mutation hook that saves the caller's user profile via `actor.saveCallerUserProfile` and invalidates the `currentUserProfile` query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAdmissionFor: Mutation hook that submits an admission form anonymously via `actor.submitAdmissionForm`, returns a client-generated placeholder admission ID, and invalidates the `candidates` query.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives, defines a warm traditional OKLCH color palette (saffron, deep red, gold) for light and dark modes, and includes print styles for the admission card.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page with a sidebar navigation that switches between four sections: Admission Applications, Photo Gallery, News & Updates, and Manage Admins.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionFormPage.tsx: Admission form page that collects applicant details and a photo, submits them via a mutation hook, and displays a printable AdmissionCard on success.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with a hero section featuring the organization logo and call-to-action buttons, followed by Gallery and News sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL/hash query parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL hash without reloading.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends border radius and box shadow, adds fade-in and accordion keyframe animations, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 19) for the Karani Sena Yuva Shakti website, including architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and image requirements for a home page, admission form, and Internet Identity-protected admin panel.
